description: This Java interface defines a REST client for interacting with core banking services such as retrieving account details and performing utility payments using Spring Cloud OpenFeign.

classes.name: BankingCoreRestClient
classes.description: A Feign client interface for communicating with core banking services, including fetching account information and executing utility payments.

methods.name: readAccount
methods.description: Fetches account details for a given account number via a GET request.

methods.name: utilityPayment
methods.description: Performs a utility payment transaction with the provided request data via a POST request.
